content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: clock
inventory=[{"type": "leather_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 5, "index": 18}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 52, "index": 19}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 20}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 57, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 4, "index": 28}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 46, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 15, "index": 41}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a clock, I need to move 4 gold ingots into the crafting grid. I will first move a gold ingot from slot 28 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: clock
inventory=[{"type": "gold_nugget", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "leather_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 5, "index": 18}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 52, "index": 19}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 20}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 57, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 46, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 15, "index": 41}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: I need to move 3 more gold ingots into the crafting grid. I will move the next gold ingot from slot 28 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: clock
inventory=[{"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "leather_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 5, "index": 18}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 52, "index": 19}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 20}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 57, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 46, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 15, "index": 41}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: I now need to move 1 redstone into the crafting grid. I will move the redstone from slot 45 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: clock
inventory=[{"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "leather_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 5, "index": 18}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 52, "index": 19}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 20}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 57, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 46, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 15, "index": 41}]
thought: I still need to move 2 more gold ingots into the crafting grid. I will move the next gold ingot from slot 28 to slot 6.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 6 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: clock
inventory=[{"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "leather_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 5, "index": 18}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 52, "index": 19}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 20}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 57, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 46, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 15, "index": 41}]
thought: Finally, I need to move the last gold ingot from slot 28 to slot 8.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 8 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: clock
inventory=[{"type": "clock", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "leather_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 5, "index": 18}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 52, "index": 19}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 20}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 57, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 46, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 15, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I can craft the clock by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
